text: Şumori mohho dar nazdi Xudo, dar kitoʙi Xudo az on rūz, ki osmonhovu zaminro ʙijofarida, duvozdah ast. Cahor moh mohhoi haromand. In ast dini durust. Dar on mohho ʙar xeştan sitam makuned. Va hamcunon, ki muşrikon hamagī ʙa çangi şumo ʙarxostand, hamagī ʙa çangi onho ʙarxezed. Va ʙidoned, ki Xudo ʙo parhezgoron ast
